Envelope Sketches

In this study, we sketch many tangent lines to curves.

Sketches

  • In this simple sketch, we plot the sine curve and many of its tangents. This shows just how simple it is to make something that looks absolutely glorious.
  • The next sketch is a variation in which the number of points at which tangents are drawn varies and slowly oscillates. Although the number of points slowly changes, the overall impact is furious activity.
  • We change the underlying function to be a product of a sine and an exponential in this sketch
  • And here, we alter the exponential and sine factors in a random way. It may take a few refreshes to get something interesting.
  • Adding noise and rythm yields this sketch, which I find rather entrancing.
